sections.heading: Database Indexing
sections.content: Create indexes on frequently queried columns to improve performance. Consider composite indexes for multi-column queries. Monitor index usage and remove unused indexes to reduce storage overhead.

sections.heading: Kubernetes ConfigMaps - Configuration
sections.content: ConfigMaps store non-confidential configuration data as key-value pairs. They can be consumed by Pods as environment variables, command-line arguments, or configuration files in volumes.

sections.heading: Database Transactions - Data Management
sections.content: Use ACID transactions to ensure data consistency. Implement proper isolation levels (READ COMMITTED, SERIALIZABLE) based on use case. Handle deadlocks and implement retry logic for transient failures.

sections.heading: Kubernetes Deployments - Application Management
sections.content: Deployments manage ReplicaSets and provide declarative updates to Pods. They ensure desired number of replicas are running and handle rolling updates, rollbacks, and scaling operations seamlessly.
